means: 扣除，减去( deduct的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The £103 is deducted from Mrs Adams' salary every month.
sentence.Network_cn: 这103英镑每月从亚当斯夫人的工资里扣掉。

sentence.Network_en: Interest is paid gross, rather than having tax deducted.
sentence.Network_cn: 利息是按照总收入给付，未扣除税金。

sentence.Network_en: The cost of your uniform will be deducted from your wages.
sentence.Network_cn: 制服费将从你的工资中扣除。

PerfectNetExp.abs: That is roughly what will be deducted automatically from your account over the year ., 这大致就是每年自动从你帐户中扣除的金额.

list.abs: 扣字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 扣杀〖 smash(theball)〗 扣除〖 deduct〗 扣发〖 deprive〗.
BEC中级、高级考试词汇超值下载篇-BEC商务英语 ... decrease v. 减少 deduct v. 扣除，减去 default n. 违约，未履行.
如同演绎（deduction）一样，归纳（ induction，正是学习器所做的） 起到知识杠杆的作用 —— 它将少量的输入知识转化成为大量的 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deduce v 推论，演绎 deduction n 推论；减法 induce v 劝诱，诱导.

entry.def: When you deduct an amount from a total, you subtract it from the total.

example.ex: The company deducted this payment from his compensation...
example.tran: 公司从他获得的赔偿金中扣去了这笔付款。

example.ex: Up to 5% of marks in the exams will be deducted for spelling mistakes.
example.tran: 试卷中最多将会有 5% 的分数因为拼写错误而被扣掉。

means.word_mean: 1. taken off or taken away from a total;

sentences.sentence: "take-home pay is what is left after subtraction of deducted taxes"

auth_sentence.content: Management, agent and attorney fees are not deducted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Management, agent and attorney fees are not deducted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Management, agent and attorney fees are not deducted.

auth_sentence.content: Mmm, a perfectly roasted coffee bean, I deducted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mmm, a perfectly roasted coffee bean, I deducted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mmm, a perfectly roasted coffee bean, I deducted.

auth_sentence.content: However, points are deducted for not listing investment trusts.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, points are deducted for not listing investment trusts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, points are deducted for not listing investment trusts.
